info.title: Embedded Protocol
info.description: Embedded Protocol (EP) methods for UCP capabilities. Methods are sent from Merchant to Host via postMessage/JSON-RPC 2.0. Method prefixes indicate capability scope: ec.* (checkout). Future capabilities may define additional prefixes (e.g., eo.* for order).

methods.name: ec.ready
methods.description: Initiates the Embedded Checkout Protocol. Merchant declares which delegations it accepts, host responds with optional channel upgrade and initial checkout state.

params.name: delegate

schema.description: Delegation types the merchant accepts. Must be subset of checkout.embedded.delegations.

params.description: Delegation types the merchant accepts. Must be subset of checkout.embedded.delegations.

upgrade.description: Channel upgrade instructions. If present, switch to provided MessagePort.

port.description: MessagePort for upgraded channel. Runtime type is MessagePort.

checkout.description: Initial checkout state with host-provided data (saved instruments, addresses).

methods.name: ec.start
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout UI is visible and ready for interaction. Sent after successful ec.ready handshake.

methods.name: ec.complete
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that order has been placed successfully.

methods.name: ec.messages.change
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout.messages has changed. Includes errors, warnings, and info. Host should update UI accordingly.

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with updated messages.

params.description: Current checkout state with updated messages.

methods.name: ec.line_items.change
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout.line_items has changed (item added, removed, quantity updated).

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with updated line items.

params.description: Current checkout state with updated line items.

methods.name: ec.buyer.change
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout.buyer has changed (email, phone, address updated).

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with updated buyer.

params.description: Current checkout state with updated buyer.

methods.name: ec.payment.change
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout.payment has changed (instrument selected, status updated).

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with updated payment.

params.description: Current checkout state with updated payment.

methods.name: ec.payment.instruments_change_request
methods.description: Merchant requests host to present payment instrument selection UI for the buyer to change their payment method.

checkout.description: Partial checkout update with payment instrument selection.

selected_instrument_id.description: ID of the selected payment instrument.

methods.name: ec.payment.credential_request
methods.description: Merchant requests host to collect payment credential for selected instrument (CVV, 3DS, wallet confirmation).

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with selected instrument.

params.description: Current checkout state with selected instrument.

schema.description: Checkout state with payment credential ready for completion.

checkout.description: Partial checkout update with payment credential.

instruments.description: Payment instruments with credential populated on selected instrument.

methods.name: ec.fulfillment.change
methods.description: Merchant notifies host that checkout.fulfillment has changed (shipping method selected, destination updated).

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with updated fulfillment.

params.description: Current checkout state with updated fulfillment.

methods.name: ec.fulfillment.address_change_request
methods.description: Merchant requests host to present address selection UI for a shipping fulfillment method.

params.name: checkout

schema.description: Current checkout state with fulfillment context.

params.description: Current checkout state with fulfillment context.

schema.description: Checkout state with updated fulfillment address.

checkout.description: Partial checkout update with fulfillment address selection.

fulfillment.description: Fulfillment with updated destinations and selected_destination_id.
